Reviews: It is gaming keyboard, so if used only for that purpose, it is decent. I actually miss many letters when I type as they need to be pressed decently hard. I am getting used to it though. Still, not the best. Definitely decent in build quality. Overall a great buy at this price, but don't buy it if you are a touch typist who types at a very high speed. Average speed typing, this keyboard will still serve your needs. Good price good quality The media could not be loaded. Go for it if you want to improve your gaming, typing speed etc etc. Bought this combo and using it for more than 3 months, it's working good. Initially used for gaming but the keyboard doesn't suited for instense gaming and mouse on other hand is very responsive. I think its very much suited for work. One thing they should work on is the backlight on keyboard which is way bright so it's very difficult to use while keeping them on. The media could not be loaded. Mouse fits too good in my hands that, I started to hate using other mouse. U can only turn off and on lights in mouse can't change colour or anything else. Keyboard have 3 options of colours and 1 with all colours styles blinking.

Description: Wired Gaming Keyboard and Mouse - Both keyboard and mouse with RGB lighting effect, 14 backlit modes gaming keyboard and 7 color effect gaming mouse, creates a cool and colorful game atmosphere to enhance the excitement of the game. Best for pc games.   Mechanical Keyboard - With all-Metal Panel and floating keys design, the keys of keyboard trigger sensitively, all 104 keys have individual switches with full n-key rollover   Programmable Mouse - Gaming mice with 6 Dots Per Inch levels available from 800/1600/ 2400/ 3200 / 4000/ 4800, can easily adjust the Dots Per Inch to match the mouse speed instantly for different game scenarios.   Keyboard Mouse Combo - Ergonomic keyboard with detachable wrist rest and smooth mouse,plug and play.   Keyboard and Gaming Mouse - Compatibility with Windows 2000/Vista/Win7/Win8/Win10/MAC/Linux for gaming pc.
Reviews: The media could not be loaded. Ive never thought a keyboard was a big deal, until now. its a solid keyboard and has no bend to it what so ever. I've been using this keyboard for a few month now and I'm very happy with the purchase. if others have to sleep in the same room). Its also very satisfying to type on this keyboard and the caps are easily removable. Overall very happy with the purchase and with Havit as a brand. The media could not be loaded. Wow. You can even customize your own lighting layouts and it remembers your configurations. The build is solid and the included palm rest is appreciated. Watch my video review for more information. Great keyboard/mouse combo so far. I have it in my home office. I love the LED back lite. Great feeling keyboard.Lots of flexibility in color schemes and designs. The mouse has multiple DPI selections and some LED flexibility. Only slight downside for me is that you cannot freely select the mouse color. It is pre-determined by the DPI you select. Not a huge issue though. Changing DPI is simple, a button on top of the mouse.

Product_Name: Havit Wired Gaming Keyboard Mouse Combo LED Rainbow Backlit Gaming Keyboard RGB Gaming Mouse Ergonomic Wrist Rest 104 Keys Keyboard Mouse 4800 DPI for Windows & Mac PC Gamers (Black)
Description: Wired Gaming Keyboard Mouse Combo   Comes with LED 104 Keys   USB Ergonomic Wrist Rest Keyboard
Reviews: I thought this combo was worth the money based on the "brilliant" and "praising" reviews it had here at Amazon. Turns out it's just another scam company. The side button in my mouse wore off within a few months. Turns out that was also a part of their business model. After a week of information exchange with my order details, I was completely snubbed. I would send them a mail requesting an update, but no, I don't get any reply. The audacity of these companies worries me. Go do yourself a favor and place order from Logitech. It's worth the little extra you spend just for the service quality they provide. good I Bought this keyboard/mouse combo early March 2019. I've absolutely loved it. Obviously if you are an extremely competitive gamer looking for the absolute best, you'll have to spend more money. But for myself and most gamers out there, you definitely can't go wrong. You cannot change the colours though, it's just on/off/breathing modes. And 2 brightness levels. I still love it. Mouse has worked amazing for me. I really love the DPI button as I have dual monitors but at night I only use one. So being able to adjust the DPI with a click of a button when switching between gaming/working/lounging is awesome. The whole mouse lights up and looks awesome, but again, no colour options, it just flashes through all the colours, or you can keep the lights off. All in all, for the price, I doubt you'd find much better. Obviously if you compare it to high end $100-$300 keyboards and what not, huge difference. The media could not be loaded. So, my first impression for this combo is great.I play for about 16 hr of game on this and works fine. Also, i want to clear couple of things.

The blue switch mechanical keys stand up to hardcore gaming.   【4 Color Lighting, 4 Levels DPI Gaming Mouse】 - This gaming mouse supports 4 color lighting and 4 levels DPI With 800-1600-2400-3200. Reviews: Keyboard and mouse are absolutely beautiful! Way better than I thought it was going to be. I find it slides and get stuck really easily. You’ll definitely need a mouse pad. Other than that I love the mouse!2) I had a terrible experience with UPS, which was the carrier for this product. I almost didn’t get this product thanks to ups lying about contacting me. I don’t mind as it’s really pretty. All in all, it’s great!! Update:Working with the seller to resolve this issue. They’ve agreed to send a mouse replacement. ****************Keyboard is excellent. Product_Name: Cooler Master Devastator 3 USB Gaming Keyboard & Mouse Combo 7 Color Mode LED Backlit Media Keys 4 DPI Settings Black
Description: Cooler Master Mem-Chanical key Switch Tactile Feel Keyboard, USB 2.0   7 Color LED Backlit Mode: Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Purple, Light Blue, and White   Avago 3050 Optical Gaming Sensor - 4 DPI Settings: 800, 1200, 1800 and 2800   6 Multimedia Keys for quick access   Laser etched and grip coated keycaps, Anti-slide rubber pads on bottom side
Reviews: Gorgeous Mouse and Keyboard combo from Cooler Master. Truely quintessential and elegant. Seven colours options both for mouse and keyboard. Build quality is sturdy. I am using this for my gaming desktop and very happy with the performance. A good combo from Cooler Master with a good premium feel and a somewhat mechanical experience from a membrane keyboard.. The mouse is quite responsive and the clicks feed good s well.. The keyboard is focused around gaming and gaming only. Keys seem to have a good durability but really painful to use this if you type alot. I am using it for almost 3 months, with nice typing experience. But, major issue I am facing right now is regarding Keyboard's Backlit. They are not easily visible during the work and I have to use a Table lamp for it. I think the LED Backlit part is just a gimmick. It is not successful in my experience. good Awesome product, specially for the price... highly recommended. Considero que existen mejores opciones al mismo precio, pero bueno pagamos marca.

Reviews: Purchased for a 12 year old for his PS4 as advertised as compatible. Arrived quickly. Looks great with the backlights and is an extra novelty factor for him. When I bought this back in 2018, it was way cheaper. £57! Are you joking... this thing didnt last 2 months. Keys come off easily, so you can lose them. The backlighting is absolutely horrible. You can get a razer or logitech keyboard for cheaper and they are way better. I hated this and threw it away. Garbage and overpriced keyboard. So thank you to flagpower for ruining that for my kids on Christmas . Buyers beware!

Product_Name: Zebronics Zeb-War Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo (Gold Plated USB Braided Cable)
Description: Country of Origin: China Keyboard Power Consumption : DC 5V, 100mA, Mouse Power Consumption : DC 5V ;100mA
Reviews: Packaging was excellent. However, there was no user manual for the various buttons. Going from a basic flat keyboard to this felt like a huge jump but I got used to it after a day or two. The mouse is really smooth and works really well even without a mousepad underneath it. My typing speed was 60-70 wpm with 80ish accuracy with my old keyboard. It jumped to 90-100 wpm but with 94+ accuracy after using this new keyboard for the FIRST TIME. Let that sink in.The mouse is excellent though it's sensitivity can be hard to manage if you arent used to it. Even if I pressed 3-4 keys simultaneously they would all get registered without any problem. My aim was accurate and precisely where I wanted it to be. You will need to either call customer care or figure out everything yourself. Some may find it neat. Other Fn keys are pretty obvious. And for mouse,Hold the DPI button (the one below the middle mouse button) if you wanna turn the RGB off. Hold it again to turn it back on.
